meanings.definition: Farthest from the center or middle.
meanings.sent1: The outermost layer of the cake was crispy.
meanings.sent2: She placed the book on the outermost shelf.
meanings.sent3: The outermost chair in the room looked lonely.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was like the outermost layer of his personality.
meanings.sent5: The outermost star in the sky twinkled brightly.

meanings.sent1: The outermost wall of the house was painted blue.
meanings.sent2: The outermost gate led to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The outermost tree in the forest waved in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the outermost layer of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The outermost edge of the cliff offered a breathtaking view.
